short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspiring quotes from the world's best writers on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get inspired by the world's best writers every time you open a new tab.

For this extension, we've curated hundreds of quotes from writers such as Stephen King, Margaret Atwood, Ernest Hemingway, Ursula K. Le Guin and Zadie Smith.

Each quote is paired with a beautiful background to get you in the mood for writing.

Whether you need words of encouragement or a bit of a kick to get going, this extension has it all.

Use the cog icon in the bottom-right corner to change how frequently the quotes will update (daily, hourly or on every new tab).

Writing Inspiration is brought to you by Writing Analytics. The extension is completely free. We respect your privacy and don't track usage or any of your personal data.

Features:

- Hundreds of quotes about writing.
- Dozens of inspiring photos from libraries around the world.
- Choose update frequency (daily, hourly or every new tab).
- Click on the author's name to discover more quotes from them.
- Time & date
